tileset.name: venoxarid_organic_test
tileset.description: Venoxarid organic terrain with moss, bioluminescence, and toxic pools

tiles.name: dense_moss_pink_mushrooms
tiles.description: dense moss-covered ground with small glowing pink mushrooms and yellow bioluminescent roots

tiles.name: moss_yellow_vines
tiles.description: moss-covered ground with twisted yellow glowing vines and organic root systems

tiles.name: dark_moss_pink_fungi
tiles.description: dark green moss with small pink bioluminescent fungi clusters

tiles.name: sparse_moss_spores
tiles.description: sparse moss transitioning to dark organic matter with small glowing pink spores

tiles.name: toxic_pool
tiles.description: bubbling toxic green liquid pool with sickly yellow edges and pink bioluminescent algae
